system.note: Eldar weapon, emits a flame that does not need oxygen (although still needs an atmosphere) to ignite. Sticks to surfaces, making it difficult to extinguish.

description.value:
Special: Flame, Spray

Note: Eldar weapon, emits a flame that does not need oxygen (although still needs an atmosphere) to ignite. Sticks to surfaces, making it difficult to extinguish.
